data.title: Thomas Electric
data.meta_description: Thomas Electric in Mansfield, OH, provides complete electrical services, and specializes in generator power systems. Call 419-989-3254.
data.text:
Thomas Electric knows you have a choice when selecting a certified General Dealer in the Mansfield, OH, area. We are an Elite Power Pro Generac Dealer that offers sales, install, yearly maintenance, and warranty work, specializing in customer care and complete satisfaction. Our team provides top quality workmanship at competitive rates and are fully licensed, insured, and certified Generac technicians. One call takes care of it all - 419-989-3254.

For many years, Thomas Electric has been an owner operated company, helping businesses and homeowners throughout our community with their electrical and power solution needs. The next time you find yourself without power or needing reliable electrical repairs, call Thomas Electric at 419-989-3254.

We want to help you be prepared when the power goes out. We are a certified with Generac Power Systems for sales, install, service, and warranty. We have over 20-years of electrical experience to help you with all of your electrical needs. Don’t wait until the power goes out and you are sitting in the dark – call us today to find out what we can do for you so that you will never be left powerless again. Get your peace of mind today!
